title: ZLZ Blue Black Ripped Distressed Jeans for Men Slim Fit, Men's Fashion Design Streetwear Destroyed Jeans Pants Stretch Fit
description: Comfortable Wear, This ripped slim fit jeans are comfortable to wear throughout the day. Its unique sweat-absorbent and breathable fabric feels soft, even after being washed many times.
Excellent Stretchy, This distressed stretch skinny jeans made of excellent elastic fabric that holds it shape throughout the day. Allows you have no restriction to move and feels comfortable.
Easy-to-Match, This slim-fit jeans can be worn casual with flats or boots and a relaxed tee, creating a chic and stylish result.
Well-Made, Each pair of our men's ripped distressed stretch jeans uses triple stiches, sturdy buttons and zippers.
Mens ripped jeans fabric content: 70%cotton 28%polyester 2% spandex, Machine washable.
